oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NEW CONFIRMATION OF THE FORMULA FOR THE CALCULATION OF ROCK FILL DIKES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Iribarren, Ramon
Nogales, Casto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: armor stone sizing
breakwater design
groin design
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the paper entitled "Una formula para el caloulo de los diques de escollera" (A Formula for the Calculation of Rock Fill Dikes) published July 1938* there was presented the expression, P=NA^3d/((cosa- sina)^3(d-1)^3) where P = weight of the individual stones or blocks in kilograms N = 15 for dikes of natural rook fill N = 19 for dikes of artificial block fill A = 2h = total height of the wave that breaks on the dike,measured in meters d = specific weight of material of the stones in tons (metric) per oubic meter a = angle of the dike's side slope with the horizontal
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 3 (1952): Proceedings of Third Conference on Coastal Engineering, Cambridge, Massachusetts, 1952.; 14
